title: Militär Kropp Fett Kalkylator
description: Beräkna your body fat percentage using the US Militär formula
metaDescription: Gratis Militär Kropp Fett Kalkylator - Beräkna your body fat percentage using the official US Militär formula. Check if you meet Militär body composition standards.

info.title: Om Militär Kropp Fett Kalkylator
info.description: The Militär Kropp Fett Kalkylator uses the official US Militär formula from Militär Regulation 600-9. This calculator determines if you meet the body composition standards required for military service. The formula uses circumference measurements of the neck, waist, and (for females) hips to estimate body fat percentage.
info.formula: Man Formel: % BF = 86.010 × log10(waist - neck) - 70.041 × log10(height) + 36.76 | Kvinna Formel: % BF = 163.205 × log10(waist + hip - neck) - 97.684 × log10(height) - 78.387
info.limitations: This calculator uses the official US Militär tape test method. For the most accurate measurement, take the average of at least three measurements rounded to the nearest 0.5 inch or cm. Soldiers who fail may request supplemental testing using DXA, InBody 770, or Bod Pod systems.
